We are proud to offer a wide range of accredited programs in Engineering and Technology that will equip students with the knowledge needed to pursue the career
The School of Business Administration (SBA) at ADUC caters to the need of multicultural workforce in the field of Business and Management.
School Of Arts And Social Sciences
The School of Arts and Social Sciences (SBA) at ADUC caters to the need of multicultural workforce in the field of Business and Management.

Campus life at ALDAR University College, enjoys the benefits of an urban campus as it is located in the heart of the historic business district of Dubai. Movie theaters, shopping centers, banks, restaurants, and other facilities are located in the vicinity of the College.

 The College is situated near the Deira City Centre Metro Station and the GGICO Metro Station. Students commuting from all over Dubai have an easy access to the College. Transportation services are provided by the College to major locations in the Northern Emirates.

 ALDAR University College provides students with the following facilities to enhance their learning experience:

 Library, fully equipped with books, e-books, journals, magazines, online databases, CDs/DVDs, multimedia rooms, discussion rooms, computers workstations, wireless Internet connection, scanning, photocopying, and printing services provides faculty and students a conducive environment for their scholarlyactivities. Classrooms and computer laboratories are equipped with smart interactive boards and state-of-the-art workstations. Students have access to a spacious lounge to conduct their various extra-curricular activities in a convenient and friendly spot.

 The College also provides ample parking space with three basement floors.

IEEE is the world’s largest technical professional organization dedicated to advancing technology for the benefits of humanity. IEEE and its members inspire a global community to innovate for a better tomorrow through its highly cited publications, conferences, technology standards, and professional and educational activities. IEEE is the trusted “voice” for engineering, computing, and technology information around the globe.

 ALDAR IEEE student’s branch was established in 2015 and is led by a committed team of students and faculty from the school of Engineering and Technology (SET).

 Its main purpose is to give students the opportunity to be a part of professional community, get exposed to the technological advancement and educational aspects occurring worldwide.

 Students of the IEEE student branch conduct the following activities:

 Formulate technical workshops and competitions Regulate professional networking through participation in technical events, international conferences and seminars Participate in international competitions and enhance the technical knowledge and skills of students in SET Coordinate with and organize trips to companies in related fields. Encourage IEEE members to connect with local IEEE Sections, share individual benefits and gain volunteering skills

 To become an IEEE member, you can contact an executive committee member through the following contacts:

The UAE is a federation of seven Emirates located in the Middle East. The country has emerged as both a dynamic international business centre and a laid-back tourist escape. From unspoiled beaches to rugged mountains, and picturesque heritage sites to ultra-modern shopping malls, the UAE offers a truly unique lifestyle experience.

 As the gateway between east and west, the UAE has become a safe and accessible base for leading multinationals from across the globe to establish a foothold in the Middle East market, and to explore emerging economies further afield. This expanding business base attracts students and professionals from around the world, giving the UAE a unique multicultural identity, where nationals from more than 200 countries live in harmony with the Emirati people.

 The higher educational landscape in the UAE reflects the cultural mix of the country. With a thirst for innovation, the UAE is also gathering a growing reputation for its advancements in research and technological development.

 One of the fastest growing cities in the world, Dubai is the place where the sophistication of the 21st century meets the unique charm of an ancient trading port. With world-class infrastructure and facilities, the city combines the cosmopolitan lifestyle of the western world with eastern traditions and hospitality.

 Already renowned for its bold ambition, as the home of the world’s tallest building and the world’s largest man-made island, Dubai will continue to grow its international stature when it hosts the World Expo in 2020.
